English: At dawn, south-east of Lamentin
Later that day back in Morton
Comrade Rashiv, an order came to lend someone from squad Anton to special forces for one action.\nThese spetsnaz arrived yesterday and were tasked to seize Lamentin.
I chose you. You might be wondering why since you don't talk much - well, that's precisely the point.\nYou are a skilled soldier, collected and focused.\nExactly what is required.
You don't have to say anything, or thank me. Not that you would.\nThis assignment won't be easy, the spetsnaz are a tough bunch - but I believe you could be an asset to them.
The man you'll be under is comrade major Grigory Lemontov. You might have heard of him.\nHe is an ace even among spetsnaz, so pay due respect.
You are expected in a few hours so better get ready.
Dismissed.
So, you are Rashiv, I have been expecting you.\nMy name is Grigory Lemontov and right now we have a lot of work to do.
We are going in as a vanguard to pave the way to Lamentin. You will stay close to me and provide support for our team.
I'll give you the details on the way. And now: forward!
Finally, comrade major. We were getting bored.
We haven't encountered any patrols. Your work?
You're working with the best, comrade major.
I noticed, Kaplinsky. Get in formation, we're going to the harbour.
STAY CLOSE TO ME, RASHIV. THE REST OF THE SQUAD SHOULD BE JUST AHEAD.
HIT THE DIRT.
DMITRY TO IVAN, WE'RE IN POSITION. LET'S GET TO WORK. OVER.
IVAN TO DMITRY, WE'RE HEADING OUT. THEY WON'T KNOW WHAT HIT THEM. OUT.
WAIT FOR THEM TO GET CLOSER. FIND YOUR TARGETS. FIRE AT MY COMMAND.
GO, GO, GO!
THE HARBOUR'S OURS. IVAN WILL KEEP GUARD. WE TAKE CONTROL OF THE ROADS. FOLLOW ME.
DMITRY TO YELENA, GO IN. WE'LL SEE YOU AT THE OUTPOST. OVER.
YELENA UNDERSTOOD. SEE YOU THERE. OUT.
SMOOTH AND CLEAN. CONTINUE ONWARDS TO THE OUTPOST. GO!
YELENA TO DMITRY, WE'RE THROUGH AND MOVING TOWARDS THE OUTPOST. OUT.
WE'RE DONE HERE. KAPLINSKY, TAKE THE SQUAD TO THE SOUTHERN FLANK AND GET READY TO ATTACK. YELENA, YOU'VE GOT THE NORTHERN FLANK. I'M GOING WITH RASHIV TO THE LOOKOUT.
WE'RE IN POSITION. RASHIV, STAY BACK AND DO NOT WANDER OFF. YOU MUST COVER MY BACK.
DMITRY TO ALL UNITS, WE'RE READY TO START. SLOWLY BUT STEADILY. GO!
YELENA TO DMITRY, FEW UNITS SLIPPED BY US AND ARE MOVING TO YOUR REAR. WATCH OUT.
RASHIV, YOU TAKE CARE OF IT.
TIME TO TAKE THE CITY. FOLLOW ME, RASHIV. ALL UNITS, GO IN.
LAMENTIN'S OURS. GOOD WORK, EVERYONE. THE OPERATION IS ENDED.
Harbour
Checkpoint
City lookout
Outpost
Yelena
Ivan
